mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, type_id, title, material, content, media_url, is_video, is_professional, likes, collections, create_time, update_time, censor_state, is_baned, is_deleted FROM t_recipe WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND (is_baned = 0 AND ${field} = #{id} AND create_time < #{dateTime}) ORDER BY create_time DESC limit #{size}
